description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 4

+33 vs Reflex; 2d10+9 damage, and ongoing 15 damage (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 4

+33 vs Reflex; 2d8+9 damage.

At-Will

Standard

The ancient adamantine dragon makes four claw attacks and then makes a bite attack against a different target.

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Reach 2

Trigger: When an enemy enters or leaves an adjacent square, at-will

+33 vs Fortitude; 2d8+9 damage, and the target is knocked prone.

Recharge 6

Ranged 20

+33 vs Fortitude; the target takes ongoing 15 thunder damage and is dazed (save ends both).

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Thunder

Standard

Close blast 5

+31 vs Fortitude; 4d12+6 thunder damage, and the target is knocked prone. Miss: Half damage. Effect: At the start of the ancient adamantine dragon's next turn, it gives a thunderous roar: close burst 5; no attack roll; 20 thunder damage.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and the ancient adamantine dragon uses it

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +33 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the ancient adamantine dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).
An ancient adamantine dragon gains resist 10 to all damage on the first attack that targets it in each round.
